name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Fundamentals of Inviscid, Incompressible Flow
lessons.description: Overview of Inviscid, Incompressible Flow.

lessons.name: Incompressible Flow over Finite Wings.
lessons.description: Understanding nIncompressible Flow over Finite Wings.

lessons.name: Three-Dimensional Incompressible Flow
lessons.description: Optimizing Three-Dimensional Incompressible Flow.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Equations of Compressible Flow
lessons.description: Compressible and Supersonic Flow

lessons.name: Supersonic Nozzle Flows & Subsonic Wind Tunnel Testing
lessons.description: Study of fluid flow through nozzles to accelerate flow to supersonic speeds & study aerodynamic properties of objects at subsonic speeds

lessons.name: Laminar and Turbulent Flows
lessons.description: subsonic flows

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Boundary Layer Heating
lessons.description: Heat transfer occurring within the boundary layer.

lessons.name: Shock Heating
lessons.description: Rapid temperature rise due to compression heating associated with shock waves.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Load Analysis & Materials Selection
lessons.description: Evaluation of external and internal loads & Selection of materials with suitable mechanical properties

lessons.name: Stress Analysis
lessons.description: Assessment of internal stresses and deformations within spacecraft structures

lessons.name: Manufacturing Processes
lessons.description: Utilization of advanced manufacturing techniques

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws of Planetary Motion
lessons.description: Fundamental principles describing the motion of celestial bodies

lessons.name: Newton's Law of Universal Gravitation
lessons.description: Study Newton's Law of Universal Gravitation

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: System Architecture Design: Definition of the overall structure and interfaces of spacecraft
lessons.description: Definition of the overall structure, interfaces, and interconnections of spacecraft subsystems
